title: Bound (1996 film)
summary: Bound is a 1996 American neo-noir crime thriller film written and directed by the Wachowskis[lower-alpha 1] in their feature film directorial debut. Violet (Jennifer Tilly), who longs to escape her relationship with her mafioso boyfriend Caesar (Joe Pantoliano), enters into a clandestine affair with alluring ex-con Corky (Gina Gershon), and the two women hatch a scheme to steal $2 million of Mafia money.
